description: REM RDI at 2% oxygen desaturation  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas in REM sleep associated with >= 2% oxygen desaturation) / (hours of REM sleep)]
calculation: 60 * ( hrembp2 + hrop2 + carbp2 + carop2 + oarbp2 + oarop2 ) / minremp

hybrid.LABEL: Calculated - Overall rem RDI at 2% oxygen desaturation
